description.en:
Sakou Watari-sensei of "Cosplay Animal" fame presents this omnibus of love stories about five boys.

First Story (ch 1):
Kyousuke is stdying to get to medical school and is desperate for money, so he used someone else's identity to become a tutor. Who would have thought that the girl he's tutoring happens to be girl he met Suzuri. On top of that he is falling for her. How long can he keep up his lie before she finds out his true identity?

Second Story (ch 2-?):
Kaichi is a student in South High's soccer team, who is determine to be the best player around. Coincidentally South High's rival team, the North High happens to be staying in the same place for their training, and there he meets one of North High's female managers Ejiri. Despite of their school rivalry, those two had become closer...
